events.name: Fashion Show
events.description: The debut of a New Generation of designers and the birth of their legacy.

events.name: Fashion Exhibition
events.dateRange: From 31st of October to 02nd of November
events.description: A curated exhibition showcasing artistic, avant-garde and innovative garments.

designers.name: Pon Chamreun
designers.bio: Through fabric, I reflect my thoughts, pain and hope. Each design becomes my voice, transforming personal stories into innovation that inspires others to see the beauty in creation.
designers.collectionConcept: Inspired by the stillness of the desert, Ethereal Silence explores the quiet harmony between humanity and nature. The collection reflects the serenity found in simplicity, the slow movement of sand, the gentle flow of wind, and the calm presence that exists even in vast emptiness.

designers.name: Chea Tichheang
designers.bio: I’ve always been drawn to things that feel dark, powerful, and beautiful in their own way something aesthetic but strong. I grew up as a boy who kept everything to myself, never really sharing my pain with anybody around me. Instead of breaking me, that silence shaped me. Every moment I held inside became a part of my strength. The darkness I carried didn’t crush me; it built me. Now, the power I find in quiet and in shadows is what defines me.
designers.collectionConcept: They move through the dark like whispers with knives, faces hidden behind the ghosts of who they used to be. Pain carved out their hearts long ago, leaving only hunger for money — cold, endless, and sharp. If you can pay, they’ll walk past you. If you can’t, they’ll smile once before the light goes out. No mercy. No feeling. Just the sound of coins and the quiet after your last breath.

designers.name: Chun Sinadanisa
designers.bio: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce consectetur at velit quis pharetra. Suspendisse faucibus egestas ex in semper. Vivamus congue magna et turpis

designers.name: Em Marie
designers.bio: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce consectetur at velit quis pharetra. Suspendisse faucibus egestas ex in semper. Vivamus congue magna et turpis

designers.name: Van Sovandy
designers.bio: Fashion, from my own fascination, involves with passion, curiosity and transformation. Whatever exists in this world has been the power to embrace the creativity with purpose. Expressing personality throughout fashion, furthermore, has paved my way for new ideas to emerge new styles which have profound impacts on diversities of human bodies and the world with intention. That’s what I relate and explore more deeply in this field. “Passion is the abstract ideas of art involved with fashion, however, involvement turns every step to reality.”

designers.name: Ong Sereyrotha
designers.bio: For me, fashion has always been more than clothing, it’s emotion, transformation, and storytelling. I want to see women as beautiful in different ways not by fitting into a standard, but by exaggerating their essence and embracing their fearless side. My work is about power and vulnerability existing together where beauty can be dramatic, imperfect, and unapologetically real. I design for women who are bold enough to be seen, to express their emotions through what they wear, and to turn their own story into art. Every piece I create reflects a part of me,my curiosity, my intensity, and my desire to show that beauty can come from rebellion, confidence, and truth.

designers.name: Sou Tammydiane
designers.bio: Fashion, to me, is more than design; it’s the language of emotion and identity. And with each creation, I seek to tell a story one of strength, softness, and the enduring beauty of being a woman. I design with one vision at heart. I want to see women elegant. To me, elegance is not just about clothing; it’s about confidence, grace, and the quiet power that lives in every woman. Through my designs, I aim to reveal that inner beauty to let it shine through silhouettes that flow naturally, fabrics that whisper sophistication, and details that feel both modern and timeless. Every piece is crafted to make a woman feel confident, graceful, and effortlessly captivating as if she were born to embody elegance itself.

designers.name: Hin Saody
designers.bio: Hin Saody is a Phnom Penh based designer student known for his beautiful, exaggerated, and dreamy elegance. Inspired by nature and culture, his work blends tradition with imagination, creating pieces that feel both timeless and provoking.

designers.name: Tang Chinhhav
designers.bio: Chinhhav is a Cambodian fashion designer whose work is dramatic, artistic, and grounded in nature. He designs inspiration nature and the beauty of  forms that grow, fade, and transform. Influenced by the  energy of late 2000s fashion, he designs for women who want to feel empowered. His work isn’t just for worn ,its arts.

designers.name: Uch Chanleakhna
designers.bio: A beginner fashion student who believes in quiet power ,the kind of strength that doesn’t need to be loud, only real. She’s still learning, exploring, and finding her voice through design. Every sketch, every stitch, and every mistake becomes a part of her growth. For her, fashion isn’t just about clothing , it’s about turning emotion into elegance and silence into strength.

designers.name: Rith Sokratanak
designers.bio: I’m a person exploring how clothes can express identity, emotion, and unique kinds of beauty. My work combines storytelling, texture, and experimentation to challenge traditional ideas of romance and self expression. I’m just starting out, but I’m guided by curiosity, creativity, and a personal love for design. Currently overdressed for every occasion.

garments.name: The Bomb
garments.description: Enough is enough, She has enough

garments.name: Storage
garments.description: Box them in. Agony, misery, resentment. She’s numb.

garments.name: Prosperity
garments.description: She fought back. It's where she heals. Where she grows. Where she developed a sheild to protect herself. Because she knows who she is. And she’s worth it.
